snippet: FISHMAN--Guglielmina, Stefani, died peacefully at home on Sunday, February 28, 2016. Born in Lugano, Switzerland she leaves behind husband of 56 years Dr. Harvey Fishman, as well as son Dr. Andrew Fishman, daughter-in-law Jelena, and grandson Theodor, son Edward J. Fishman Esq., daughter-in-law Hester, granddaughter Casey, and grandson James. Guglia attended Hofstra University and Adelphi University and had a successful career as a social worker. She spoke five languages and was a great lover of opera. Her cremated remains will be buried in her childhood churchyard in Aquila, Switzerland. 1/3
lead_paragraph: FISHMAN--Guglielmina, Stefani, died peacefully at home on Sunday, February 28, 2016. Born in Lugano, Switzerland she leaves behind husband of 56 years Dr. Harvey Fishman, as well as son Dr. Andrew Fishman, daughter-in-law Jelena, and grandson Theodor, son Edward J. Fishman Esq., daughter-in-law Hester, granddaughter Casey, and grandson James. Guglia attended Hofstra University and Adelphi University and had a successful career as a social worker. She spoke five languages and was a great lover of opera. Her cremated remains will be buried in her childhood churchyard in Aquila, Switzerland. 1/3
